experience.title: Shift Leader
details: Oversee daily shift operations, address customer inquiries, and lead a team of ten members in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Implemented a waste management system, aligning product production with sales trends to reduce waste and increasing overall profitability.

experience.title: Team Leader
details: Served as an apprentice under managerial guidance, honing social and leadership skills while overseeing a small team.
Refined and adapted leadership techniques through targeted mentorship.

experience.title: Counter Staff
details: Operated a point-of-sale system to manage transactions efficiently.
Collaborated with team members to maintain an organized and sanitary work environment.
